jparsec.graph

Class SkyChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.SkyChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class SkyChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    An interactive sky chart element.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • KEY_ZOOM_IN

        public static int KEY_ZOOM_IN
        The key ID for zoom in action. Page down by default.

      • KEY_ZOOM_OUT

        public static int KEY_ZOOM_OUT
        The key ID for zoom out action. Page up by default.

      • skyRender

        public SkyRendering skyRender
        The sky rendering object used for this chart.

      • chart

        public SkyRenderElement chart
        The Sky object.

      • chartForDragging

        public SkyRenderElement chartForDragging
        The Sky object for dragging. Default value is null for an automatic mode.

      • calcEvents

        public boolean calcEvents
        Set to false to avoid displaying events in the popup menu. Default is true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SkyChart

        public SkyChart(int w,
        int h,
        SkyRendering sky)
         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a chart.
        Parameters:
        w - Width.
        h - Height.
        sky - The sky rendering object.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • SkyChart

        public SkyChart(int w,
        int h,
        SkyRendering sky,
        boolean showModifyLocTimeCoordButtons,
        boolean isApplet,
        int updateTime)
         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a chart.
        Parameters:
        w - Width.
        h - Height.
        sky - The sky rendering object.
        showModifyLocTimeCoordButtons - False to disable the modification of location, time, and projection/coordinate system.
        isApplet - True if the component is inside an applet. The only effect is a wait message when ephemerides of comets/asteroids will be calculated in the next frame.
        updateTime - Time interval to update in seconds for real-time mode. Default value is 5s.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • SkyChart

        public SkyChart(int w,
        int h,
        SkyRendering sky,
        boolean showModifyLocTimeCoordButtons,
        boolean isApplet,
        int updateTime,
        boolean increaseSpeed)
         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a chart.
        Parameters:
        w - Width.
        h - Height.
        sky - The sky rendering object.
        showModifyLocTimeCoordButtons - False to disable the modification of location, time, and projection/coordinate system.
        isApplet - True if the component is inside an applet. The only effect is a wait message when ephemerides of comets/asteroids will be calculated in the next frame.
        updateTime - Time interval to update in seconds for real-time mode. Default value is 5s.
        increaseSpeed - True to increase speed when dragging (fast labels are enabled and Milky way is not filled). Default value is automatic, measuring speed at runtime.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • SkyChart

        public SkyChart(int w,
        int h,
        SkyRendering sky,
        boolean showModifyLocTimeCoordButtons,
        boolean isApplet,
        int updateTime,
        SkyRenderElement skyForDragging)
         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a chart.
        Parameters:
        w - Width.
        h - Height.
        sky - The sky rendering object.
        showModifyLocTimeCoordButtons - False to disable the modification of location, time, and projection/coordinate system.
        isApplet - True if the component is inside an applet. The only effect is a wait message when ephemerides of comets/asteroids will be calculated in the next frame.
        updateTime - Time interval to update in seconds for real-time mode. Default value is 5s.
        skyForDragging - The properties for the rendering when the sky is being dragged.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • SkyChart

        public SkyChart(java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        Throws:

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Updates the panel to a new size.
        Returns:
        True if the update process is going on, false it is not started since another previous one is still going on.

      • update

        public boolean update(int w,
             int h)
        Updates the panel to a new size.
        Parameters:
        w - With.
        h - Height.
        Returns:
        True if the update process is going on, false it is not started since another previous one is still going on.

      • update

        public void update(SkyRenderElement sky,
          TimeElement time,
          ObserverElement obs,
          EphemerisElement eph,
          java.lang.String object)
            throws JPARSECException
        Updates the chart.
        Parameters:
        sky - New sky object.
        time - New time object.
        obs - New observer object.
        eph - New ephemeris object.
        object - The object to center, or null.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.
